Value: Transforms the shaman into a Flame Ascendant with powerful elemental abilities. Gives him 1000 bonus hp and 15 hp regen per second. Also heals allies in a 600 aoe around the caster for 250. |n|nHas Incinerate, Immolation, Flame Strike, Volcanic Eruption, and Chain Explosion.|n|nLasts 45 seconds.
